name: dragos-worldview-threat-intel
label: Dragos WorldView Threat Intelligence
description: Dragos WorldView industrial threat intelligence provides actionable information and recommendations on threats to operations technology (OT) environments.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: FQDN of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: api_token
fields.description: API Access Token of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Secret Key
fields.name: api_secret
fields.description: API Secret Key of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get All Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves paginated list of all indicators from Dragos based on various parameters such as indicator type, value and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Indicator Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Specify indicator value to get details from Dragos.

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: (Optional) Type of indicator whose details you want to retrieve from Dragos. Choose from the following indicator types: Domain, Filename, Hostname, IP, MD5, SHA1, SHA256.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records that the operation should include per page. Page size default value is 500. Page size must be less than 1001
parameters.tooltip: Page size default value is 500. Page size must be less than 1001
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: (Optional) Page number from which you want to retrieve records. Default value: 1

parameters.title: Updated After
parameters.tooltip: Datetime from which you want to retrieve indicators
parameters.description: (Optional) Datetime of updated after from which you want to retrieve indicators. The datetime must be in the ISO format (UTC). If you specify the datetime then only those indicators that are modified later are retrieved.
parameters.name: updated_after

parameters.title: Serial
parameters.description: Specify CSV/list of serial for which indicators you want to retrieve. Search for indicators matching a report serial.
parameters.name: serial

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Specify CSV/list of tags for which indicators you want to retrieve. Search for indicators matching tag(s) text.

operations.title: Get Cached Stix2 Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a list of cached stix2 bundle of the last 12 months of indicators from Dragos. Note: This action is not available to trial users.

operations.title: Get All Products
operations.description: Retrieves list of all products from Dragos based on various parameters such as sort by, serial and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Sort By Field
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.tooltip: Sort returned products Default value is Release Date
parameters.description: Sort returned products Default value is Release Date.

parameters.title: Sort Direction
parameters.name: sort_desc
parameters.tooltip: The order in which to receive results. Valid values are ASC (ascending) or DESC (descending).
parameters.description: Select the direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between ASC (Ascending) or DESC(descending).

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: (Optional) Page number from which you want to retrieve records. Default value: 1

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records that the operation should include per page. Page size default value is 500. Page size must be less than 1001
parameters.tooltip: Page size default value is 500. Page size must be less than 1001
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.title: Updated After
parameters.tooltip: Datetime from which you want to retrieve products
parameters.description: (Optional) Datetime of updated after from which you want to retrieve products. The datetime must be in the ISO format (UTC). If you specify the datetime then only those products that are modified later are retrieved.
parameters.name: updated_after

parameters.title: Serials
parameters.description: Specify CSV/list of serial for which products you want to retrieve. Search for products matching a report serial.
parameters.name: serials

parameters.title: Indicator
parameters.description: Specify indicator for which filter reports related to a given indicator (exact match only).
parameters.name: indicator

operations.title: Get Product Details
operations.description: Retrieve details of product from Dragos based on various parameters such as product serial number and details of product metadata, CSV file or STIX2.0 JSON.

parameters.title: Details of
parameters.name: details_of
parameters.tooltip: Retrieve the details of product on selecting.
parameters.description: Retrieve the details of product. You can choose from, Product Metadata: Returns the metadata of a product. CSV File: Returns the CSV file for the indicators related to a given serial.  STIX2.0 JSON: Returns the STIX2.0 JSON bundle for the indicators related to a given serial.

parameters.title: Product Serial Number
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify product serial number for which you want to retrieve details.

operations.title: Get All Tags
operations.description: Retrieves list of all tags from Dragos based on various parameters such as page number, page size, and tag type that you have specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: (Optional) Page number from which you want to retrieve records. Default value: 1

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of records that the operation should include per page. Page size default value is 100. Page size must be less than 500.
parameters.tooltip: Page size default value is 100. Page size must be less than 500

parameters.title: Tag Type
parameters.name: tag_type
parameters.description: Specify tag type for which tags you want to retrieve.
